name: 黃瀅瑛
objective: 此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境相關技術於工作環境及其設計之應用。課程中將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計。
schedule:
Week #	Session/topic

2	In-class video 
3	Visit
4	VR/AR technology
5	Practice & training session I
6	Human visual system & perception
7	VR/AR in driving simulation
8	Practice & training session II
9	Eye-tracking in VR/AR
10	Motion-capturing in VR/AR
11	Practice & training session III

13	Practice & training session IV
14	VR/AR in manufacturing industry
15	Visualization, perception, HCI
16	VR/AR in production design
17	Group oral presentation (Part 1/2)
18	Group oral presentation (Part 2/2)
